Enum MD_TopicCategoryCode_Type

Namespace
NDSH.Geospatial.Metadata.V2003.Thin.Identification
Assembly
NDSH.Geospatial.Metadata.V2003.Thin.dll

High-level geographic data thematic classification to assist in the grouping and search of available geographic data sets. Can be used to group keywords as well. Listed examples are not exhaustive.

[Serializable]
public enum MD_TopicCategoryCode_Type
Extension Methods
ExtensionMethods.GetXmlEnumName<T>(T)
ExtensionMethods.GetXmlEnumAttributeOrName<T>(T)
ExtensionMethods.GetXmlEnumAttribute<T>(T)

[EnumMember(Value = "biota")] Biota = 2

Flora and/or fauna in natural environment.

[EnumMember(Value = "boundaries")] Boundaries = 3

Legal land descriptions.

[EnumMember(Value = "climatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere")] ClimatologyMeteorologyAtmosphere = 4

Processes and phenomena of the atmosphere.

[EnumMember(Value = "economy")] Economy = 5

Economic activities, conditions and employment.

[EnumMember(Value = "elevation")] Elevation = 6

Height above or below sea level.

[EnumMember(Value = "environment")] Environment = 7

Environmental resources, protection and conservation.

[EnumMember(Value = "farming")] Farming = 1

Rearing of animals and/or cultivation of plants.

[EnumMember(Value = "geoscientificInformation")] GeoscientificInformation = 8

Information pertaining to earth sciences.

[EnumMember(Value = "health")] Health = 9

Health, health services, human ecology, and safety.

[EnumMember(Value = "imageryBaseMapsEarthCover")] ImageryBaseMapsEarthCover = 10

Base maps.

[EnumMember(Value = "location")] Location = 13

Positional information and services.

[EnumMember(Value = "oceans")] Oceans = 14

Features and characteristics of salt water bodies (excluding inland waters).

[EnumMember(Value = "planningCadastre")] PlanningCadastre = 15

Information used for appropriate actions for future use of the land.

[EnumMember(Value = "society")] Society = 16

Characteristics of society and cultures.

[EnumMember(Value = "structure")] Structure = 17

Man-made construction.

[EnumMember(Value = "transportation")] Transportation = 18

Means and aids for conveying persons and/or goods.

[EnumMember(Value = "utilitiesCommunication")] UtilitiesCommunication = 19

Energy, water and waste systems and communications infrastructure and services.

Remarks

It is understood there are overlaps between general categories and the user is encouraged to select the one most appropriate.
